body: This is an issue with gencumulativesky component. Check this discussion and make sure the sky gets generated correctly: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/weird-radia...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/weird-radiation-result?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1425833&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987)
